title: Why is ketchup so hard to pour? - George Zaidan

multiple-choice.question: What type of fluid is ketchup classified as?

options.label: A
options.text: To increase the thickness of ketchup

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: It changes the flavor of the ketchup

multiple-choice.question: A person wants to get ketchup out of a bottle. Which of the following methods is likely to be effective?

options.label: A
options.text: Giving the bottle a series of short, sharp shakes

options.label: B
options.text: Giving the bottle a few long, slow languid shakes

options.label: B
options.text: Giving the bottle a few long, slow languid shakes with the lid on, then taking the lid off and pouring

options.label: C
options.text: Hitting the bottle once very, very hard with the lid on, then taking the lid off and pouring

options.label: D
options.text: Pouring the ketchup directly from the bottle without shaking

options.label: C
options.text: They would produce more glucose as the final product

options.label: D
options.text: To deliver energy for the conversion of phosphoglycerates to glyceraldehyde 3-phosphates
